name: 3D Special Ops VR - Night Vision Edition
name_original: 3D Special Ops VR - Night Vision Edition
description:
Get ready for an insane FPV shooting game where you need to take out a bunch of terrorists using nothing but night vision mode! You will feel like you are playing a true VR game -- minus the headset! The way this game is designed, its in a pure first person mode as if you were looking through an actual night vision goggles.

How far do you think you can make it? Good luck!

FEATURES

- Non stop action!
- Lots of weapons to unlock!
- Awesome soundtrack!
